summary: This document is an amendment to the statement supporting the registration of a civil aircraft in the name of JEGE, LLC, which is organized in the United States Virgin Islands. It details the management structure of the LLC, including the appointment of Thomas H. Huff as the manager, and outlines the requirements for U.S. citizenship for the LLC to register aircraft.

persons.name: Thomas H. Huff
persons.context: Thomas H. Huff is identified as the manager of JEGE, LLC, responsible for overseeing its operations.

keyFacts: The full name of the LLC is JEGE, LLC.
The LLC was organized in the United States Virgin Islands.
The effective date of the LLC is October 19, 2012.
Thomas H. Huff is the manager of the LLC.
The document outlines requirements for U.S. citizenship for LLC members to register aircraft.
